title: [Grawood Farmstead, Meadow]
description: A path has been created by those passing to and fro, through the tall grasses and wildflowers, to a heavy-limbed pear tree sitting in the distance.  Beneath the tree's limbs, a few fireflies dart through the air, leaving bright trails before they disappear again into the leaves.  Flattened and broken around the base of the trunk, the grass is a cushioned seat which is silvered by the moonlight that strikes the backs of the green blades.

A path has been created by those passing to and fro, through the tall grasses and wildflowers, to a heavy-limbed pear tree sitting in the distance.  Beneath the tree's limbs, a small area of shade is created, offering shelter from the bright sun above.  Flattened and broken around the base of the trunk, the grass is a cushioned seat, which has been recently utilized if the open book left behind is any indication.
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
